ideas.title: Replace hardcoded hex colors with design tokens in WaitlistSpotifySearch
ideas.description: Replace numerous hardcoded hex colors (e.g., #d7d9de, #2c2e33, #0f1011, #1DB954, #6c78e6) with Tailwind design tokens
ideas.rationale: Hardcoded colors break theme consistency and make dark mode maintenance difficult. The design token system in packages/ui/theme/tokens.ts provides proper semantic tokens
ideas.current_state: Uses hardcoded hex colors like border-[#d7d9de], bg-[#0f1011], text-[#1DB954], focus-within:ring-[#6c78e6]/40
ideas.proposed_change: Replace with design tokens: border-subtle, bg-surface-0, text-brand-spotify, focus-within:ring-accent/40. Use cn() for conditional classes
ideas.user_benefit: Consistent appearance across themes, better dark mode support, easier maintenance

ideas.title: Add aria-label to DSPButton for screen reader accessibility
ideas.description: DSPButton component lacks an aria-label, relying only on visible text 'Open in {name}'
ideas.rationale: Screen reader users need clear context. The button opens external links and should indicate this behavior accessibly
ideas.current_state: Button has no aria-label, uses dangerouslySetInnerHTML for logo SVG without accessible alternative
ideas.proposed_change: Add aria-label={`Open in ${name} (opens in new window)`} and ensure SVG logo has aria-hidden='true'
ideas.user_benefit: Screen reader users understand button purpose and behavior

ideas.title: Replace hardcoded disabled colors in DSPButton with design tokens
ideas.description: DSPButton uses inline styles with hardcoded colors #9CA3AF and #FFFFFF for disabled state
ideas.rationale: Inline hardcoded colors bypass theme system and create inconsistency
ideas.current_state: Uses style={{ backgroundColor: disabled ? '#9CA3AF' : backgroundColor, color: disabled ? '#FFFFFF' : textColor }}
ideas.proposed_change: Use Tailwind disabled: variants with design tokens: disabled:bg-surface-2 disabled:text-tertiary-token
ideas.user_benefit: Consistent disabled state appearance matching design system

ideas.title: Add focus-visible ring to BillingDashboard loading skeleton
ideas.description: BillingDashboard loading skeleton does not have visible focus indicators for accessibility
ideas.rationale: Loading skeletons should have proper focus management for screen reader users navigating with keyboard
ideas.current_state: Loading skeleton uses aria-busy but no focus management. Skeleton divs have no sr-only description
ideas.proposed_change: Add aria-live='polite' and sr-only descriptive text: 'Loading billing information'
ideas.user_benefit: Screen reader users are informed that content is loading

ideas.title: Add consistent empty state illustration to admin creator profiles table
ideas.description: AdminCreatorProfilesUnified empty state shows text only without visual illustration
ideas.rationale: Visual empty states improve UX by clearly communicating the lack of content and possible actions
ideas.current_state: Shows minimal text: 'No creator profiles found' in a div
ideas.proposed_change: Use EmptyState component pattern like in TippingEmptyState with illustration, heading, and description
ideas.user_benefit: Clearer visual feedback when no data exists, with actionable guidance

ideas.title: Add motion-reduce support to WaitlistSpotifySearch loading spinner
ideas.description: Loading spinner in dropdown uses animate-spin without motion-reduce alternative
ideas.rationale: Users with vestibular disorders may experience discomfort from spinning animations
ideas.current_state: Uses animate-spin class without motion-reduce:animate-none modifier
ideas.proposed_change: Add motion-reduce:animate-none to all animate-spin instances. Reference LoadingSpinner pattern which correctly uses motion-reduce:animate-[spin_1.2s_linear_infinite]
ideas.user_benefit: Respects user preference for reduced motion, improves accessibility

ideas.title: Add keyboard shortcut hints to theme toggle
ideas.description: ThemeToggleSegmented has keyboard shortcut functionality but hints are only in sr-only span
ideas.rationale: Keyboard shortcuts should be discoverable by all users, not just screen reader users
ideas.current_state: Uses tooltips with TooltipShortcut component. Shortcut hints exist but may not be visible on hover
ideas.proposed_change: Ensure TooltipShortcut is visible on hover/focus and displays 'L' and 'D' keyboard shortcuts visually
ideas.user_benefit: Users discover keyboard shortcuts faster, improving efficiency

ideas.title: Add error recovery action to WaitlistSpotifySearch search error state
ideas.description: Search error state shows 'Search failed. Try again.' but no retry button
ideas.rationale: Error states should provide clear recovery actions, not just describe the problem
ideas.current_state: Shows text: 'Search failed. Try again.' with no actionable button
ideas.proposed_change: Add a 'Retry' button that clears the error and allows re-search. Follow ErrorBanner pattern with action buttons
ideas.user_benefit: Users can easily recover from errors without manually clearing and retyping

ideas.title: Standardize border radius values across waitlist components
ideas.description: WaitlistSpotifySearch uses hardcoded rounded-[6px] while design system uses rounded-lg (8px)
ideas.rationale: Inconsistent border radius creates visual discord with rest of app
ideas.current_state: Uses rounded-[6px] for inputs and dropdowns
ideas.proposed_change: Replace rounded-[6px] with rounded-lg from design tokens (packages/ui/theme/tokens.ts radii.lg)
ideas.user_benefit: Consistent visual language across the application

ideas.title: Add loading state to Change button in WaitlistSpotifySearch URL mode
ideas.description: Change button in URL mode has no loading state when artist is selected
ideas.rationale: Buttons that trigger state changes should indicate processing to prevent double-clicks
ideas.current_state: Change button only has disabled={isSubmitting} but no visual loading indicator
ideas.proposed_change: Use Button component with loading prop from @jovie/ui instead of plain button element
ideas.user_benefit: Clear feedback during state transitions, prevents confusion

ideas.title: Add focus trap to dropdown results in WaitlistSpotifySearch
ideas.description: Dropdown results list allows focus to escape while navigating with keyboard
ideas.rationale: Combobox/listbox patterns should trap focus within results for proper keyboard navigation
ideas.current_state: Uses tabIndex={-1} on options but Tab key closes dropdown instead of cycling through options
ideas.proposed_change: Implement proper focus trap when dropdown is open, only Tab+Escape should close dropdown
ideas.user_benefit: Keyboard users can navigate all options without accidentally closing dropdown

ideas.title: Replace gray-* color classes with design token equivalents in TippingEmptyState
ideas.description: TippingEmptyState uses Tailwind gray-800, gray-100, gray-600, gray-400 instead of design tokens
ideas.rationale: Hardcoded gray scale bypasses theme system and creates inconsistency with rest of app
ideas.current_state: Uses text-gray-800 dark:text-gray-100, text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400
ideas.proposed_change: Replace with text-primary-token, text-secondary-token from design system
ideas.user_benefit: Consistent text colors across the application

ideas.title: Add skeleton loading to ReleasesEmptyState search results
ideas.description: ReleasesEmptyState loading skeleton uses inline bg-surface-3 which is correct but could use LoadingSkeleton component for consistency
ideas.rationale: Using shared LoadingSkeleton component ensures consistent loading patterns
ideas.current_state: Uses inline divs with animate-pulse and bg-surface-3
ideas.proposed_change: Use LoadingSkeleton component from @/components/molecules/LoadingSkeleton for consistency
ideas.user_benefit: Consistent loading skeleton appearance with proper accessibility attributes

ideas.title: Add aria-describedby to BillingDashboard error state buttons
ideas.description: ErrorBanner action buttons don't have aria-describedby linking to error description
ideas.rationale: Screen reader users should understand what error the retry button addresses
ideas.current_state: Buttons in ErrorBanner have no aria-describedby linking them to error message
ideas.proposed_change: Add id to error description and aria-describedby to action buttons referencing it
ideas.user_benefit: Screen reader users understand context of action buttons

ideas.title: Add confirmation feedback after CopyToClipboardButton success
ideas.description: CopyToClipboardButton shows success icon but no persistent confirmation message
ideas.rationale: Users may miss the brief icon change, especially if they look away after clicking
ideas.current_state: Changes icon to Check and uses sr-only aria-live announcement
ideas.proposed_change: Add a brief toast notification or visible 'Copied!' text that persists for 2 seconds
ideas.user_benefit: Clear visual confirmation of successful copy action

ideas.title: Add touch target size check to social link icons
ideas.description: SocialLink component uses h-10 w-10 (40px) which is below recommended 44px minimum
ideas.rationale: WCAG recommends minimum 44x44px touch targets for mobile accessibility
ideas.current_state: Uses h-10 w-10 (40px x 40px) for touch target
ideas.proposed_change: Increase to h-11 w-11 (44px x 44px) or add padding to meet minimum touch target
ideas.user_benefit: Easier to tap on mobile devices, especially for users with motor impairments

ideas.title: Add visible focus ring to waitlist platform selection chips
ideas.description: WaitlistSocialStep platform chips have focus-visible ring but using hardcoded color
ideas.rationale: Focus indicators should use design system colors for consistency
ideas.current_state: Uses focus-visible:ring-[#6c78e6]/40 with hardcoded color
ideas.proposed_change: Replace with focus-visible:ring-accent/40 from design tokens
ideas.user_benefit: Consistent focus ring colors matching theme

ideas.title: Add optimistic UI feedback to SocialLink click handler
ideas.description: SocialLink click handler has async tracking but no immediate visual feedback
ideas.rationale: Users should see immediate feedback when clicking links, even before tracking completes
ideas.current_state: handleClick is async but provides no visual loading state. Deep link may take time to resolve
ideas.proposed_change: Add brief loading indicator or scale animation while deep link is being processed
ideas.user_benefit: Users know their click was registered, reducing confusion and double-clicks

ideas.title: Add announcement for DashboardOverviewSkeleton completion
ideas.description: DashboardOverviewSkeleton has aria-busy but no announcement when loading completes
ideas.rationale: Screen reader users should be notified when content finishes loading
ideas.current_state: Uses aria-busy='true' and aria-live='polite' but parent component may not announce completion
ideas.proposed_change: Ensure parent component updates aria-busy='false' and optionally announces 'Dashboard loaded'
ideas.user_benefit: Screen reader users know when they can interact with loaded content

ideas.title: Consolidate duplicate LoadingSkeleton imports
ideas.description: Multiple components import LoadingSkeleton from different relative paths
ideas.rationale: Consistent import paths improve maintainability and prevent import confusion
ideas.current_state: Some components import from @/components/molecules/LoadingSkeleton, others may use relative paths
ideas.proposed_change: Ensure all LoadingSkeleton imports use @/components/molecules/LoadingSkeleton alias
ideas.user_benefit: Easier code maintenance and consistent component usage
